content: skill level easy size finished circumference about 19 in 48 5 cm will stretch to fit a range of sizes materials * lion brand® scarfie® art #826 1 ball shown in 201 cream/black * lion brand® double-pointed knitting needles size 8 5 mm * lion brand® stitch markers * lion brand® large-eyed blunt needle additional materials * circular knitting needle size 8 5 mm 16 in 40 5 cm long * 3 x 3 in 7 5 x 7 5 cm piece of cardboard notes * earflaps are worked first then stitches are cast on between earflaps for the back of hat * lower back of hat is worked in row then stitches are cast on for front of hat and work is joined to work in the round * decreases are worked to shape top of hat when stitches have been sufficiently decreased double pointed needles or magic loop are used instead of the circular needle * stitches are picked up on lower edge of each earflap for the cords * tassels are tied to the end of each cord and to the top of the hat
